column15: Lawn Bowls added as a sport

column8: Spinal injury
column15: First quadraplegic competition added. Demonstration events for vision impaired athletes

column8: Spinal injury, Amputee, Vision Impairment, Les Autres
column15: First use of specialised racing wheelchairs. Volleyball (Standing), Goalball and Shooting added as sports

column8: Spinal injury, Amputee, Vision Impairment, Cerebral Palsy, Les Autres
column15: Sitting Volleyball added as a discipline. Events for athletes with Cerebral Palsy included

column8: Spinal injury, Amputee, Vision Impairment, Cerebral Palsy, Les Autres
column15: Football 7-a-side and Boccia added as sports. Cycling added as a discipline. Wheelchair Racing included as demonstration event at Olympic Games

column8: Spinal injury, Amputee, Vision Impairment, Cerebral Palsy, Les Autres
column15: Judo and Wheelchair Tennis added as sports. Co-operation between Olympic and Paralympic Organizing Committees. Shared venues with Olympics which has continued ever since

column8: Spinal injury, Amputee, Vision Impairment, Cerebral Palsy, Les Autres
column15: Event benchmark in organisational excellence

column8: Spinal injury, Amputee, Vision Impairment, Cerebral Palsy, Les Autres, Intellectual Disability
column15: Equestrian added as a sport. Track cycling added as a discipline

column8: Spinal injury, Amputee, Vision Impairment, Cerebral Palsy, Les Autres, Intellectual Disability
column15: Sailing and Wheelchair Rugby added as sports. Record ticket sales

column8: Spinal injury, Amputee, Vision Impairment, Cerebral Palsy, Les Autres
column15: Football 5-a-side added as a sport

column8: Spinal injury, Amputee, Vision Impairment, Cerebral Palsy, Les Autres
column15: Rowing added as sport. Cumulated TV audience of 3.8 billion

column8: Spinal injury, Amputee, Vision Impairment, Cerebral Palsy, Les Autres, Intellectual Disability
column15: After an absence of 12 years intellectually disabled athletes competed in athletics, swimming and table tennis

column8: Spinal injury, Amputee, Vision Impairment, Cerebral Palsy, Les Autres, Intellectual Disability
column15: Para Canoe and Para Triathlon added as sports bringing total number to 22

column8: Spinal injury, Amputee, Vision Impairment, Cerebral Palsy, Les Autres, Intellectual Disability
column15: Para badminton and Para taekwondo were added to the Paralympic programme for the first time.

column8: Spinal injury, Amputee, Vision Impairment, Cerebral Palsy, Les Autres, Intellectual Disability
column15: First summer games in France. The first time the Paralympic Opening Ceremony was held outside of a stadium

column15: Demonstration event: Sledge Racing

column15: Demonstration event: Downhill Sledge Racing

column15: Ice Sledge Hockey added as a sport

column15: Demonstrated rising media interest in Paralympic Winter Sport

column15: Number of tickets on sale had to be augmented due to high demand

column15: Wheelchair Curling added as a new sport.

column8: Spinal injury, Amputee, Vision Impairment, Cerebral Palsy, Les Autres
column15: Ticket sales exceeded 230,000, the most ever.

column8: Spinal injury, Amputee, Vision Impairment, Cerebral Palsy, Les Autres
column15: 316,200 tickets were sold, the most ever for Paralympic Winter Games. Para snowboard made its Paralympic Winter Games debut as part of IPC Alpine Skiing.
